General.Name: Cineworld Group plc
General.Description: Cineworld Group plc engages in the cinema business. It is also involved in financing, retail, cinema property leasing, ticket booking, film distribution, advertising, and gift promotion activities. The company operates its cinema sites under the Regal, United Artists, Edwards theatres, Cineworld, Picturehouse, Cinema City, Yes Planet, and Rav-Chen brands. As of December 31, 2021, it operated 9,181 screens in 751 sites in the United States, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Poland, Israel, Hungary, Romania, the Czech Republic, Bulgaria, and Slovakia. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Brentford, the United Kingdom. On September 7, 2022, Cineworld Group plc along with its affiliates, filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the District of Southern District of Texas.
General.Address: Vantage London, Brentford, United Kingdom, TW8 9AG
